controller.roster

Class AddAssignmentDialogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.roster.AddAssignmentDialogController

  • public class AddAssignmentDialogController
extends java.lang.Object
    The dialog that allows the user to add assignments to the gradebook
    Author:
    Gavin Scott

      • checkNameValid

        private boolean checkNameValid()
        Checks if the entered name is valid. Valid names must be under 25 characters, and unique.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the name is valid
